== Karthikappally (CT) (628258) ==

Karthikappally (CT) is a town in the [[Karthikappally]] taluka of [[Alappuzha]] district with an area of 8.74 sq. km. and harbouring 4988 households with total population of 19021 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Alappuzha]] is at a distance of 32 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 150 km. Male population is 8912 and female population is 10109. Scheduled Caste population is 1372 and Scheduled Tribes population is 38. Census Location Code of the town is 628258<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Alappuzha (m + og) at a distance of 32 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 98 km. Railway station is at Haripad at a distance of 6 km.
